Repeat: [(k1, p1, k1) in next stitch] twice, p2
(wrap yarn twice around needle to knit the next stitch) 6 times, k2

one by one slip 3 long stitches to right needle, dropping extra loop for each stitch; then return the 3 stitches to the left needle and knit them together through the back loops; slip next 3 long stitches to right needle, dropping extra loop from each, return 3 stitches to left needle and knit the 3 stitches together through the front loops; p2
